column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I never really liked the concept of tapas
column2: it just seems like I'm being cheated since all the portions are so small. The dishes here were worth it though and tasty to boot. The paella was a little oily in my opinion but still good nonetheless. As far as the sangria goes
column3: I've had better. Cafe Iberico comes to mind and frankly the sangria at Weber Grill stands out before Ba-ba-reeba's
column4: Not a bad place but I think it'll be a while until I go for tapas again.
